title: Step 102

challengeFiles.name: index
styles
script

tests.text: Your random function should return a random number between the first two numbers in the array.
Your random function should return a whole number (integer).

description: Create a random property. This property should use the first two numbers from an array to generate a random whole number. The range for this number starts at the smaller positive number (inclusive) among the first two numbers and ends just before the sum of these two numbers. Use the Math.floor() and Math.random() methods for the calculation.
